QuestData.Title: Paddle to Safety
QuestData.Description: Perhaps... perhaps I can still help my people.$b$bI overheard conversations between the foreman and his men. It sounds as if the source of this corruption comes from the deeper waters, where the Stormriggers do their monster hunting.$b$bPlease, assist me in investigating this. I can still redeem myself and this operation.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Escape Rowboat to travel to Outrigger Post.
QuestData.CompletionText: I can't sit idly by anymore.
QuestData.RewardText: From here, we can launch our investigation.
